```{r}
library(igraph)
library(dplyr)
library(sqldf)
```


```{r}
edges1986<-read.csv("cleanedData/TradeEdges1986.csv")
countryExport1986<-read.csv("cleanedData/TotalExport1986.csv")
countryExport1986<-select(countryExport,Reporter.Country.Code,Reporter.Countries,totalExport)
edges1986<-select(edges1986,Reporter.Country.Code,Partner.Country.Code)
edges1986<-arrange(edges1986,Reporter.Country.Code)
countryExport1986<-arrange(countryExport,Reporter.Country.Code)
graph<-graph_from_data_frame(edges1986,directed = T,vertices = countryExport1986)
plot(graph,vertex.label=V(graph)$Reporter.Countries)
gorder(graph)
```
